title: Region Changing
body: So, i was looking through the Store on the client and i couldnt find where i can change my region. i was wondering how to change my accounts region. And if it's possible still or not

replies.body: Hey there, transfers are still down due to technical issues.  Our devs will be keeping updates on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page, though, I don't have any updates myself yet.  Hang tight!
